item.title: Devias Question
item.dc:creator: @King_C_R_0_W_N King C R 0 W N
item.description:

Like this?

[code]add this void:
public void Prices4rares()
{
sendQuest(“Prices for Rares - By P I M P 3 D Tut”, 8144);

sendQuest("@red@red mask-37M", 8155);
sendQuest("@gre@green mask - 17M", 8156);
sendQuest("@blu@blue mask - 23M", 8157);
sendQuest("@dbl@santa hat - 20 mill", 8158);

showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

search for “help”
should look something like this:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) {

above that,
Add this :

	} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rareprices")) {
		Prices4rares();

100% pimp3d tut[/code]

Pimp3d tut made for me =d Good kid lol.
